attributes.action: Stop Cruel Disability Benefit Cuts in the Welfare Reform Green Paper
attributes.additional_details:
These reforms risk:
	•	Forcing disabled and medically retired people into poverty
	•	Removing support for lifelong, progressive conditions
	•	Handing more power to a broken PIP system
	•	Punishing those who paid in but got sick

Disabled people deserve protection, not cuts disguised as reform.
attributes.background: Stop the 4-point PIP rule cutting support for complex conditions. Protect Contribution-Based ESA and medically retired people. Scrap time limits on lifelong illness. Ensure full scrutiny of these damaging disability reforms.
